abstract: Rights activists accuse guards at a Cairo prison of killing inmate Essam Atta by forcing water into his body with hoses, case they say shows the continued use of torture by security forces since the ouster of Pres Hosni Mubarak.
snippet: Rights activists on Friday accused guards at a Cairo prison of killing an inmate by forcing water into his body with hoses.
lead_paragraph: Rights activists on Friday accused guards at a Cairo prison of killing an inmate by forcing water into his body with hoses.

headline.seo: Egypt: Guards At Cairo Prison Accused of Torture
